casebody.data:
99-0657 (La. 4/23/99)

STALLINGS CONSTRUCTION COMPANY, INC., The Lemoine Company, Inc. and Stallings Construction Company, Inc. and the Lemoine Company Incorporated, a Joint Venture v. STATE of Louisiana through The LOUISIANA STADIUM and Exposition District. No. 99-C-0657. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 23, 1999.

IN RE: Stallings Construction Co.; Lemoine Company Inc.; — Plaintiffs); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, Number 98CA-1527; Parish of Orleans Civil District Court Div. “J” Number 95-18123

Denied.

TRAYLOR, J. not on panel.
